### createRegionBitmaps() {#a256b83fe44bf082d4481816fad515e86}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>GlobalVariable &#42; InstrLowerer::createRegionBitmaps (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instrprofmcdcbitmapinstbase">InstrProfMCDCBitmapInstBase</a> &#42; Inc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvalue/#aedfa75f0c85c4aa85b257f066fbea57c">GlobalValue::LinkageTypes</a> Linkage)</>}>
Create the MC/DC bitmap as a byte-aligned array of bytes associated with an MC/DC Decision region.

The number of bytes required is indicated by the intrinsic used (type <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instrprofmcdcbitmapinstbase">InstrProfMCDCBitmapInstBase</a>). This is called as part of setupProfileSection() and is conceptually very similar to what is done for profile data counters in createRegionCounters().

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/instrprofiling-cpp/#l00378">378</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/instrprofiling-cpp">InstrProfiling.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Create the region counters.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/instrprofiling-cpp/#l00359">359</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/instrumentation/instrprofiling-cpp">InstrProfiling.cpp</a>.

### doSampling() {#a6087425b5ecd2da73568992f9a73a4a2}

<MemberDefinition
